panel.component: 1,10,3,10,0,300,3,300,2,200|title[Getting Started[description[Watch video tutorials and learn how to build a professional web site while using the Rennder platform.[details button[Learn More,#r=support-getting-started|title[Dashboard[description[Learn about all the functionality your dashboard has to offer you to manage your web pages, analytics, collaborators, and source code.[details button[Learn More,#cool|title[Page Editor[description[Learn about all the tools you can utilize to create the most compelling web site that you can possibly imagine.[details button[Learn More,|title[Components[description[Discover all the types of components that you can drag & drop onto your web pages to add more functionality.[details button[Learn More,|title[RML[description[Learn how to custom design components for your web site by using the Rennder Markup Language (RML), along with HTML & CSS.[details button[Learn More,|title[Applications[description[Find support for any of our platform applications, such as the Storefront or Newsletter apps.[details button[Learn More,|title[Google[description[Learn about the Google technologies that Rennder uses in order to help your web site flourish.[details button[Learn More,,,,1|title[SEO & Marketing[description[Optimize your web site for Google and learn how to bring visitors to your web site and keep them engaged enough to stay.[details button[Learn More,|title[A/B Testing[description[Learn how to create two versions of a web page to test with your visitors and see which version performed the best.[details button[Learn More,
